title: Private Island Overwater Villas near Singapore with All-Inclusive Dining, Massages & Roundtrip Transfers from Batam Pier
description:
The dreamy Telunas Private Island awaits just off the coast of Singapore, nestled between the azure waters of the Malacca Strait and the Java Sea. Tucked in a secluded cove and surrounded by lush jungle and shimmering ocean, this oasis lets all the stresses of modern life wash out with the tide. Get back to nature just a few hours from the vibrant metropolis of Singapore - all villas are refreshingly free from Wi-Fi, and the surrounding scenery is home to incredible local wildlife, from pink dolphins to eagles and monkeys.

You'll find everything you need for utter relaxation on the island. Allow Telunas Private Island to pamper you with an all-inclusive selection of exquisite meals prepared by in-house chefs as you explore and uncover the beauty of this exclusive island paradise. Indulge in a premium massage as the tropical breeze carries you away to a state of total bliss. For those seeking adventure, enjoy sea kayaking, stand-up paddleboarding and even a guided walking tour through the verdant wilderness.
offer_address: Ruko Imperium Superblock Block B No. 35&36 Jalan Sudirman, Taman Baloi, Batam Center, Batam 29432, Indonesia

title: Private Island Paradise with Daily Meals Included
description: Your private island escape awaits just off the coast of Singapore, nestled between the pristine azure waters of the Malacca Strait and the Java Sea. Experience total relaxation at Telunas Private Island staying in a dreamy Overwater Villa with daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, return land and boat transfers from Batam Island - the nearest main island - and a refreshing welcome drink on arrival.
offer_address: Ruko Imperium Superblock Block B No. 35&36 Jalan Sudirman, Taman Baloi, Batam Center, Batam 29432, Indonesia
